remarks: Equivalent wff's yield equal ordered-pair class abstractions (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)
statement:
opabbid.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
opabbid.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
opabbid.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
opabbid $p |- ( ph -> { <. x , y >. | ps } = { <. x , y >. | ch } ) $.
